document_name: PRODOC Energy and Emvironment Programme 6th-CP PSD.pdf

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The project provides support to environmental governance through the Federal Ministry of Environment by increasing public awareness policy, legal and regulatory reforms to improve protection of natural resources and sustainable livelihoods. It will also put in place a functioning normative, policy and institutional framework so that the social and economic costs of natural resource use are fully reflected in policy and action.

donor_name: UN DEPT OF ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL AFFAIRS
outputs.output_descr: The project will involve a first wave of assessment, planning and action on Climate Change  at Federal level (vulnerability and adaptation assessments- development of a framework for national response institutional capacity and financing in place for the first wave
Alternative source of energy policies put in place at the state level and increased awareness of the general public to combat climate change issues in the state.
Support to Post Disaster Coordination and Early Recovery Programmed Response in Nigeria

project_descr: Good environmental governance based increasingly on policy, legal and regulatory frameworks and actions that are more likely to protect natural resources as well as livelihoods with minimum threshold of national action on climate change achieved.
